items.q: In the video game 'Overwatch', which character is a highly mobile British time-jumper who dual-wields pulse pistols?
items.explanation: She became the primary mascot character for the multiplayer shooter.

items.q: The board game 'Mousetrap' is primarily won by having the largest piece of plastic cheese at the end.
items.explanation: The objective is to physically catch your opponents' mouse game pieces in the Rube Goldberg trap.

items.q: In the card game 'Texas Hold'em', players receive exactly two private cards at the beginning of the hand.
items.explanation: These are called hole cards, which are used alongside the five community cards.

items.q: What genre-defining 1996 video game heavily popularized 3D survival horror with fixed camera angles and tank controls?
items.explanation: The player explores a terrifying, puzzle-filled mansion infested with zombies.

items.q: What incredibly popular tabletop game uses highly detailed, painted plastic miniatures to fight grimdark sci-fi battles?
items.explanation: The hobby involves both assembling and painting the models, and playing the game.

items.q: Which highly influential massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) was released by Blizzard in 2004?
items.explanation: It became the most popular MMORPG in history by far.

items.q: In the game 'Yahtzee', how many dice does a player roll to achieve specific scoring combinations?
items.explanation: Rolling five of the same number explicitly constitutes a 'Yahtzee'.

items.q: What intense, stealth-heavy video game series features the protagonist Solid Snake dismantling nuclear mechs?
items.explanation: Created by Hideo Kojima, it popularized deeply cinematic video game storytelling.

items.q: Which classic board game involves answering trivia questions across six specific categories to fill a circular plastic token?
items.explanation: The six categories originally included Geography, Entertainment, History, Art, Science, and Sports.

items.q: What notoriously difficult 2011 platformer asks the player to guide a creature made of meat past buzzsaws?
items.explanation: It requires precision platforming and quick reflexes.
